name: Friction Labs Secret Stuff Chalk Cream
description: From setting off to clipping the chains, Secret Stuff keeps your hands dry. Apply a small amount and within seconds, all the moisture evaporates leaving you with a perfect, thin layer of chalk.75ml bottle lasts about 100 uses.Great for gyms, and way less messy than loose chalk.Keeps your hands dry without having to re-chalk when working long problems.
